newsitem.title: USA: Dress Barn Jan same-store sales up 29 pct.
newsitem.headline: Dress Barn Jan same-store sales up 29 pct.

text.p: The Dress Barn Inc said same store sales jumped 29 percent for the four week period ended January 25, 1997.
Total sales were $22.6 million, up 30 percent from sales of $17.4 million for the same period last year.

For the second quarter ended January 25, 1997, sales grew to $131.4 million from $119.0 million for the same thirteen week period last year, up 10 percent. Same-store sales grew nine percent during the second quarter, the company said.
